oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tamme provides a short account concerning a Makoba who goes to his country when it rains. The Makoba say they see a rainbow and the rain falls. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-12.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Makoba
